methods.onUpdate:
Process notification of table changes.

:param added: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - rows added
:param removed: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - rows removed
:param modified: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - rows modified

text:
Simplest appropriate legacy InstrumentedListener implementation for BaseTable and descendants. It's expected that
 most use-cases will require overriding onUpdate() - the default implementation simply passes index updates
 through to the dependent's listeners.

 It is preferred to use BaseTable.ShiftAwareListenerImpl over BaseTable.ListenerImpl
